permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,b.details: This is the permit interface used by DAI and CHAI

params.allowed: Boolean that sets approval amount, true for type(uint256).max and false for 0
params.expiry: The timestamp at which the permit is no longer valid
params.holder: The address of the token holder, the token owner
params.nonce: The holder's nonce, increases at each call to permit
params.r: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`
params.s: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`
params.spender: The address of the token spender
params.v: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Approve the spender to spend some tokens via the holder signature
